channel.title: Configuration on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Configuration on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Storage_Group_Array_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Storage_Group_Array_Type Service Datatype Description Supported hardware raid modes Methods getAllObjects getHardwareComponentModels getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Configuration_Storage_Group_Array_Type record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template Service Datatype Description Configuration template class encapsulated an arbitrary configuration values for various resources. Methods copyTemplate Copy a configuration template and returns a newly created template copy deleteObject Deletes a customer configuration template. editObject Edit the object by passing in a modified instance of the object getAccount getAllObjects Retrieves all available configuration templates. getConfigurationSections getConfigurationTemplateReference getDefaultValues getDefinitions getItem getLinkedSectionReferences getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Configuration_Template record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section Service Datatype Description Configuration section allow you to divide a large configuration values into a smaller pieces. Methods getDefinitions getDisallowedDeletionFlag getLinkedTemplate getLinkedTemplateReference getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section record. getProfiles getSectionType getSectionTypeName getSubSections getTemplate hasSubSections Check if object has sub-sections

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition Service Datatype Description Configuration definition gives you details of the value that you’re setting. Methods getAttributes getDefaultValue getGroup getMonitoringDataFlag getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition record. getSection getValueType

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition_Group Service Datatype Description Configuration definition groups help categorize definitions. Methods getAllGroups getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition_Group record. getParent

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition_Type Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition_Type further defines the value of a configuration definition. Methods getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition_Type record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition_Value
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition_Value Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Configuration_Section_Value is used to set the value for a configuration definition Methods getDefinition getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition_Value record. getTemplate

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Profile
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Profile Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Profile help you keep track of custom configuration profiles. Methods getConfigurationSection getMonitoringAgent getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Profile record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Reference
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Reference Service Datatype Description Configuration section reference allow you to reuse a configuration section from another configuration template. Methods getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Reference record. getSection getTemplate

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Type Service Datatype Description Configuration section type Methods getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Type record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Type Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Type defines the types of configuration template. Template types can be custom, default and so on. Methods getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Type record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Storage_Group_Array_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Storage_Group_Array_Type Datatype Description Supported hardware raid modes Local description Type: string driveMultiplier Type: integer hotspareAllow Type: boolean id Type: integer keyName Type: string maximumDrives Type: integer minimumDrives Type: integer name Type: string Relational hardwareComponentModels Type: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model[] Relational hardwareComponentModelCount A count of Type: unsignedLong

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Storage_Group_Array_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Storage_Group_Array_Type Service Datatype Description Supported hardware raid modes Local description Type: string driveMultiplier Type: integer hotspareAllow Type: boolean id Type: integer keyName Type: string maximumDrives Type: integer minimumDrives Type: integer name Type: string Relational hardwareComponentModels Type: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Model[]

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Storage_Group_Order
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Storage_Group_Order Datatype Description Single storage group(array) used for a hardware server order. If a raid configuration is required this object will describe a single array that will be configured on the server. If the server requires more than one array, a storage group will need to be created for each array. Local arrayNumber Type: integer arraySize Type: decimal arrayTypeId Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Storage_Group_Order
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Storage_Group_Order Datatype Description Single storage group(array) used for a hardware server order. If a raid configuration is required this object will describe a single array that will be configured on the server. If the server requires more than one array, a storage group will need to be created for each array. Local arrayNumber Type: integer arraySize Type: decimal arrayTypeId Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Storage_Group_Template_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Storage_Group_Template_Group Datatype Description Single storage group(array) used in a storage group template. If a server configuration requires a raid configuration this object will describe a single array to be configured. Local diskControllerIndex The disk controller for the array. Type: integer grow Flag to use all available space. Type: boolean hardDrivesString Comma delimited integers of drive indexes for the array.

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Storage_Group_Template_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Storage_Group_Template_Group Datatype Description Single storage group(array) used in a storage group template. If a server configuration requires a raid configuration this object will describe a single array to be configured. Local diskControllerIndex The disk controller for the array. Type: integer grow Flag to use all available space. Type: boolean hardDrivesString Comma delimited integers of drive indexes for the array.

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Configuration_Template data type contains general information of an arbitrary resource. Local accountId Internal identifier of a SoftLayer account that this configuration template belongs to Type: integer createDate Created date Type: dateTime description Configuration template description Type: string id Internal identifier of a configuration template. Type: integer itemId Internal identifier of a product item that this configuration template is associated with Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Configuration_Template data type contains general information of an arbitrary resource. Local accountId Internal identifier of a SoftLayer account that this configuration template belongs to Type: integer createDate Created date Type: dateTime description Configuration template description Type: string id Internal identifier of a configuration template. Type: integer itemId Internal identifier of a product item that this configuration template is associated with Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Attribute Datatype Description Configuration template attribute class contains supplementary information for a configuration template. Local value Value of a configuration template attribute Type: string Relational configurationTemplate Type: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template Relational

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Attribute Datatype Description Configuration template attribute class contains supplementary information for a configuration template. Local value Value of a configuration template attribute Type: string Relational configurationTemplate Type: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section data type contains information of a configuration section. Configuration can contain sub-sections. Local createDate Created date Type: dateTime description Configuration section description Type: string id Internal identifier of a configuration section. Type: integer linkedTemplateId Internal identifier of a sub configuration template that this section points to. Use this property if you wish to create a reference to a sub configuration template when creating a linked section.

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section data type contains information of a configuration section. Configuration can contain sub-sections. Local createDate Created date Type: dateTime description Configuration section description Type: string id Internal identifier of a configuration section. Type: integer linkedTemplateId Internal identifier of a sub configuration template that this section points to. Use this property if you wish to create a reference to a sub configuration template when creating a linked section.

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition Datatype Description Configuration definition gives you details of the value that you’re setting. Some monitoring agents requires values unique to your system. If value type is defined as “Resource Specific Values”, you will have to make an additional API call to retrieve your system specific values. See [[SoftLayer_Monitoring_Agent::getAvailableConfigurationValues|Monitoring Agent]] service to retrieve your system specific values. Local createDate Created date Type: dateTime

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition Service Datatype Description Configuration definition gives you details of the value that you’re setting. Some monitoring agents requires values unique to your system. If value type is defined as “Resource Specific Values”, you will have to make an additional API call to retrieve your system specific values. item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition_Group Datatype Description Configuration definition group gives you details of the definition and allows extra functionality. item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition_Value
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition_Value Datatype Description SoftLayer_Configuration_Section_Value is used to set the value for a configuration definition Local createDate Created date Type: dateTime definitionId Internal identifier of a configuration definition that this configuration value if defined by Type: integer modifyDate Internal Last modified date Type: dateTime templateId Internal identifier of a configuration template that this configuration value belongs to Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition_Value
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Definition_Value Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Configuration_Section_Value is used to set the value for a configuration definition Local createDate Created date Type: dateTime definitionId Internal identifier of a configuration definition that this configuration value if defined by Type: integer modifyDate Internal Last modified date Type: dateTime templateId Internal identifier of a configuration template that this configuration value belongs to Type: integer

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Profile
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Profile Datatype Description Some configuration templates let you create a unique configuration profiles. For example, you can create multiple configuration profiles to monitor multiple hard drives with “CPU/Memory/Disk Monitoring Agent”. SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Profile help you keep track of custom configuration profiles. Local agentId Internal identifier of a monitoring agent this profile belongs to. Type: integer createDate Created date Type: dateTime id Internal identifier of a configuration profile.

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Profile
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Profile Service Datatype Description Some configuration templates let you create a unique configuration profiles. For example, you can create multiple configuration profiles to monitor multiple hard drives with “CPU/Memory/Disk Monitoring Agent”. SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Profile help you keep track of custom configuration profiles. Local agentId Internal identifier of a monitoring agent this profile belongs to. Type: integer createDate Created date Type: dateTime id Internal identifier of a configuration profile.

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Reference
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Reference Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Reference data type contains information of a configuration section and its associated configuration template. Local createDate Created date Type: dateTime id Internal identifier of a configuration section reference. Type: integer modifyDate Modified date Type: dateTime sectionId Internal identifier of a configuration section. Type: integer templateId Internal identifier of a configuration template.

item.title: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template_Section_Reference

Type: integer modifyDate Modified date Type: dateTime sectionId Internal identifier of a configuration section. Type: integer templateId Internal identifier of a configuration template.

item.title: copyTemplate
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template::copyTemplate Overview Copy a configuration template and returns a newly created template copy Parameters Name Type Description templateObject SoftLayer_Configuration_Template Template object. Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Configuration_TemplateInitParameters Optional Headers SoftLayer_Configuration_TemplateObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Configuration_Template

item.title: deleteObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template::deleteObject Overview Deletes a customer configuration template. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Configuration_TemplateInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values boolean

item.title: editObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Configuration_Template::editObject Overview Edit the object by passing in a modified instance of the object. Use this method to modify configuration template name or description. Parameters Name Type Description templateObject SoftLayer_Configuration_Template A skeleton SoftLayer_Configuration_Template object with only the properties defined that you wish to change. Unchanged properties are left alone. Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Configuration_TemplateInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values boolean
